name: Geometry Barrage
description:
Geometry Barrage

Destroy the bothersome shapes that are threatening your peace!

Mechanics

Shoot the shapes with their matching bullets to obliterate them. Rack up streaks of kills without being hit to heal. Protect yourself from the annoying attackers.

Controls
  • Q/W/E/R: Change bullet to corresponding shape
  • Arrow keys: Shoot in respective direction
Tools Used
  • Unity
  • LMMS
  • GIMP
  • Bfxr
